vsParam:
Ah, ah ha!
Ho! Hey... hey hah!

Not enough! Do 100 frog jumps after this!
You can't get stronger if you don't work harder!

Anis is wielding a wooden sword?
What's going on here? What am I looking at?

Oh, you are here, [px].
You come for the training, too?

No, thanks...
But why is Anis training?

Uh, you guys...
She came to me the other day and asked me to train her...

Ah... Anis thinks that her fitness is poor.
But, Cresson, wouldn't frog jump be too outdated?

What are you saying!
That's the most orthodox training my Captain taught me!

Anis, you'll be an excellent guard once you
finish this training! So... Keep up, Anis!!

No no no...
I don't think Anis wants to be a guard...

Puff, puff... Drillmaster Cresson!
I am done with 100 sword-wielding...

Okay! Next!
Let's go to another place, Anis!

Ah ha ha... hmm.
It's been so many times, how stubborn Anis is...

Hmm, Sorel!
You are observing Anis too.
This is not the first time, right?
Why don't you train with her?

No way.
I don't want to do frog jumps anymore.

Anis was always like that... She's too serious,
and wants to correct any shortcoming once she finds one.

But her attempts always fail.
This has become a part of her personality...

I think we can just leave her alone on the issue
unless she goes too far... So, may I ask a favor of you?

Uh? Ask a favor of us?
What is it?

Er, here's the thing. I think that Anis will be exhausted
sooner or later if she continues to train like that.

So, I have to trouble you again... [px].
Can you prepare something to replenish her strength?

Ah, ah ha ha... You guys really are best friends...
So, let's prepare something for her... Ah ha ha...
